comments:
1. Open ant view
2. add buildfile
3. select target or entire ant buildfile
4. context menu Open With->In-Place Editor

Error message box appear "Unable to create part".

if Eclipse JVM is started with console window then message
"Arguments <jar file name> and <bean name> are required." 
is printed in console window when error occurs.
